class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.auth.domain.AuthToken
class.sql-query: delete from os_auth_tokens where login_audit_log_id in ( select login_audit_log_id from ( select cl.login_audit_log_id from os_user_api_calls_log cl inner join os_auth_tokens t1 on t1.login_audit_log_id = cl.login_audit_log_id group by cl.login_audit_log_id having max(call_end_time) < :latestCallTime ) td )
class.query: delete from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.auth.domain.AuthToken t where t.user.id in (:ids)
